synopsis.text: Low on luck and struggling with poverty, You Keika, the descendant of a renowned family of exorcists, works part-time as a fortune teller and computer technician. One fateful night, he encounters a mysterious and charismatic exorcist, Tanmoku Ki, battling an evil spirit in a junkyard. As misfortune would have it, You Keika is struck by a car and becomes a ghost. Upon waking up, he is greeted by Tanmoku Ki, who reveals that You Keika is now a spirit. In order to protect each other from harmful spirits, Tanmoku Ki proposes a pact, asking You Keika to become his spirit shadow. As they join forces, they face numerous challenges in the spiritual realm while safeguarding those around them. Along the way, their master-servant relationship evolves into an unexpected bond, filled with mutual admiration and camaraderie. Little did they know that this fateful encounter would lead to a lifelong friendship.
